headline: B&L NICHOLAS ILLUMINATOR
description: Includes Lamp, Linkage, and Variable Transformer       AVAILABLE ONLY WITH THE PURCHASE OF A B&L STEREOZOOM MICROSCOPE
specstable:
Manufacturer Bausch & Lomb
Model Nicholas Illuminator
Illumination Power Volts: 6
Condition Very Good
Other Information

Functions as a free-standing unit or lamp may be
mounted on StereoZoom stands
Projects a 35 mm spot at 600 foot candle intensity
with a color intensity of 2800K

Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.500 in (11.4 cm)
Depth 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Height 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Weight 5 lb (2 kg)
